name: One Percent Left
description:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 Summary

Hey small phone, your battery is running out quickly and you need to go to the BIG POWER OUTLET. To do this, you will need to run across the city while keeping your battery as charged as possible. Don't worry, you will have some tiny power outlets on your path where you can plug-in to and charge up a bit. 

DON'T LET YOU DIE and HAVE FUN!

Controls

- Q -> Go Left

- D - > Go Right

- Space -> Jump

- Right Click -> Detach / Aim Plug

- Left Click -> Shoot Plug

 Disclaimer

- All 3D models, textures, UI elements and scripts were made by our team.

- We're sorry we couldn't make an HTML5 port but we didn't find a way to make it with Unreal Engine 4.27, if anyone knows how to do it, please contact us.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
